Contact Us

Tip of the Month

Submit a DBA for Your LSAs

In late 2021, Google announced it is ramping up its enforcement of requirements designed to ensure that businesses utilizing its Local Services Ads (LSAs) are advertising under names that belong to them. Thus, if you operate your law firm under a name that differs from your registered business name, you must submit a DBA to avoid any problems with your LSAs.

Learn More
